original:
Business law encompasses a wide range of legal areas relevant to the operation and management of businesses. It is an essential component of both law school and business school curricula. Key topics within business law include:

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - 
Business law plays a critical role in ensuring that businesses operate within the legal framework, addressing issues that can significantly impact their operations.
